data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Ratnagiri, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ratnagiri, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Ratnagiri, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Ratnagiri, Maharashtra, India.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Ratnagiri.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Ratnagiri, Maharashtra, India to the gospel today.
Lord, remember the Bawtar people. Make the Bawtar people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Ratnagiri.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Ratnagiri to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Ratnagiri, Maharashtra, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received
